entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
